Flow.description:
2MAY25 - COLIN - Expanded Fault Paths messaging 21MAR25 - COLIN - Fault Paths 19MAR25 - JUNI & CHARLS - Added WPE Deprecated Plan in the Condition under Get Subscription Plan Information Filter and Get Subscription Plan Information No Filter 22FEB25 - Charls- Remove Previous button for 3 Screens (Select Pricebook Entry, Apply Promotion, Add On Confirmation) 05FEB25 - David - Added checks for Order and Opp Types to exclude Promo screen from Upgrade path 20JAN25 - COLIN - Removal of Previous button on Sub Plan selection screen for Upgrade loss of Opp ID issue 11DEC24 - COLIN - Update Opp with Screen DC choices 25APR24 - COLIN - Initial Screen added 19JUN23 CC (PJ) - Fix issue with stage resetting back to 1 when add/update subscription plan. 30Mar23 - CC - Remove Currency field from Subscription Plan selection datatable in 'Create Opportunity - Select Subscription Plan' screen Sort Asc/Name on Subscription_Family_Choice
19June23 - Added a required picklist select of datacenter to the select Subscription Family screen and assigned it to the Opportunity record just before it's updated, SF360-331

dynamicChoiceSets.description: The list of all DataCenters available, as per the picklist value set used in Opportunity

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_add_some_Add_Ons
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add some Add-Ons?

fields.name: confmsg
fields.fieldText: If you would like to add a promotion, select one of the below or click Next to proceed without one.

value.stringValue: Promotion_Name__c:90, Coupon_Code__c:90, Percent_Discount__c:90, Flat_Rate_Discount_Amount__c:215, CurrencyIsoCode:120, Start_Date__c:90, End_Date__c:90

fields.name: SubscriptionPlanConfirmation
fields.fieldText: Confirmation: Subscription plan has been successfully picked.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ErrorScreen
fields.fieldText:
Apologies, there was a problem:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Next Steps:

  • Please review the error message and attempt to correct the issue
  • Search the error message for errors related to FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION and review
  • Also search the error message for errors related to INSUFFICIENT_ACCESS_OR_READONLY which may require engaging the Help Desk / RevOps teams for role hierarchy adjustments
  • If you are unable to address the issue, please raise a ticket by messaging the user @sf360helpdesk in Slack

fields.name: DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please select a Subscription Plan from the list below:

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText: Subscription Plan {!SelectSubscriptionPlan.outputSelectedRow.Name} does not have any Pricebook associated. Kindly sync with Netsuite or select different Subscription Plan. Please contact your Salesforce Administrator.

fields.name: Initial_Screen_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: To Add or Update a Subscription Plan for this Opportunity

fields.name: lockedMessage
fields.fieldText: This Opportunity is in locked Status due to pending approval. Please try again later...

fields.name: PricebookSelection
fields.fieldText: Please select a Price Book for the Subscription Plan "{!SelectSubscriptionPlan.outputSelectedRow.Name}".

fields.name: selectsubscriptionfamily
fields.fieldText: Please select the Subscription Family for the new plan. All the Plans associated with the selected family will display on the Next screen:

fields.name: selectDataCenter
fields.fieldText: Please select a suitable Country/DataCenter for the new plan. The Country/DataCenter selected should be the closest geographical location to the Account address:
